title: Eco-Luxury Studio Oasis with Private Garden in Polnocne Suwalki
description: Experience refined eco-luxury in this newly renovated studio apartment, thoughtfully designed for sustainability and contemporary comfort. This premium studio features an open-plan living area, deluxe finishes throughout, and direct access to your own private garden—perfect for moments of tranquility and unwinding. The secured entrance with an automatic gate and access to an elegant shared sauna elevate your daily living, while a tranquil shared courtyard offers added space for relaxation.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the serene, low urban-level neighborhood of Polnocne, this home is part of a conscientious, eco-minded community. Enjoy the unique advantage of peace and privacy, with quick connectivity via the main highway to both the Suwalki city center and the surrounding natural landscapes. Nearby, you'll find small organic markets, green spaces, and vibrant neighborhood gatherings that exemplify a premium yet down-to-earth lifestyle.
target_buyer: The ideal buyer is an individual or couple seeking a luxuriously appointed, sustainably designed home with maximum privacy and refined features—perfect for eco-conscious professionals or creatives who desire a premium lifestyle outside the urban core.
market_positioning: This property stands at the top of Suwalki’s premium studio market, combining boutique-level interior design with exclusive amenities often found only in larger homes, ideal for buyers who value luxury and environmental consideration in a tranquil neighborhood.
